attributes.action: Let’s parents decided if they want to send their children back to school
attributes.additional_details: I would like to be able to be given a choice as to sending my child back to school in the uk from September 2020  and not be fined .
attributes.background: I want you not to force parents to make a decision based on their child’s health for fear of fines .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300399
